comments.raw_text: Form data sync takes a long time on devices that don't perform great on disk I/O (e.g. Android). We need to add async APIs to satchel for reading and writing data asynchronously, off the main thread. The write API should support bulk operations akin to mozIAsyncHistory::updatePlaces.
comments.text: Form data sync takes a long time on devices that don't perform great on disk I/O (e.g. Android). We need to add async APIs to satchel for reading and writing data asynchronously, off the main thread. The write API should support bulk operations akin to mozIAsyncHistory::updatePlaces.
comments.creator: philipp@weitershausen.de
comments.author: philipp@weitershausen.de

comments.raw_text: Bug 566746 is changing the underlying storage to use off-main-thread read/writes. It sounds like to fix this bug we need to additionally add an efficient "batch update" API.
comments.creator: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.author: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.text: Bug 566746 is changing the underlying storage to use off-main-thread read/writes. It sounds like to fix this bug we need to additionally add an efficient "batch update" API.
